h2_title: Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide
content: At lower health, it may also curl into a ball but fly up into the air to slam down while still curled up. Be wary when trying to counter this move, as it will start to squirm around before unraveling into a quick two-hit claw swipe as it reorients itself.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Centipede_Guai.md', within the main section titled 'Centipede Guai', specifically from the subsection 'Centipede Guai Boss Fight and Guide'.
The content is as follows:
At lower health, it may also curl into a ball but fly up into the air to slam down while still curled up. Be wary when trying to counter this move, as it will start to squirm around before unraveling into a quick two-hit claw swipe as it reorients itself.
